Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Runpod Manager Android App

- Jetpack Compose + Material 3 UI
- MVVM architecture with Hilt DI
- Runpod REST API integration
- Features: list, create, start, stop, delete pods
- SSH and Jupyter Lab connection info
- Network Volume selection
- Animated splash screen

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add voice commands and improve terminal ANSI support

- Add silent voice recognition \(no Google dialog\)
- Voice commands sent in lowercase without auto-enter
- Double-space converts to TAB in terminal
- Replace "/" key with Enter in extra keys bar
- Use xterm-256color for better ANSI escape sequence support
- Add PTY resize synchronization with terminal size
- Add RECORD_AUDIO permission for voice input

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
